question.title: Changing TargetSDK to 34 in Android app gives "Attempt to load writable dex file:.."
question.body:
Updating to TargetSDK 34 breaks our game at runtime, with this error:

"Attempt to load writable dex file: /data/user/0/gamename/app_.gpg.classloader/4105d0375b9d69fe6ee3a07b7893a4f1_games.jar"

We are using the V1 cpp GPG sdk, because according to this page, "The Play Games Services v2 Native SDK is in beta and only supports the Sign-in service. It doesn't yet support other Play Games Services features."

We're using latest Android Studio (Narwhal). We've tried the 'setReadOnly();' workaround that others have described, and there's a similar question here, but it doesn't help. We were wondering if anyone has recent experience?
